translation.pomodologger_desc: Pomodoro timer with Google Calendar log
translation.sigin_in_desc: Sign in with Google to log your work on Google Calendar
translation.failed_to_connect_to_google: Failed to connect to Google Calendar.
translation.log_desc: A log will be automatically added to your calendar when you complete a session.
translation.try_adding_a_log: You can try adding a log by clicking the button below.
translation.notification_enabled: You will receive a notification when a session/break is completed.
translation.request_permission: Please allow notifications in browser settings.
translation.save_timer_desc: Current timer settings will be saved in your browser's local storage.
translation.save_settings_desc: Current Sound & notification settings will be saved in your browser's local storage.
